summary: Forgable, smithable & enchantable silverware for the beginner player OR those that like funny weapons.
descriptionHtml:
These are usable as weapons in either hand. They have excellent speed and can be smithed to a much higher damage level as well as enchanted like anything else. You can find them under MISC at any forge and require only the STEEl SMITHING PERK & 1 Silver Ingot..you get 12 Forks OR 12 Knifes per ingot. Sharpening only requires 1 gold piece per fork or knife.

-There is a Main Custom Silver Fork & Knife with higher Damage levels.
-The Basic Fork and Knifes from the game are at the forge as well...with unchanged damage levels.

TIP: This can be exploited to make $ in the game.

If you like this MOD please ENDORSE it and feel free to check out my other MODs :-)

Whiterun Archery Shop - skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37130
Better Breezehome Basement - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36235
Incendiary Arrows - http//www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34104
Denise Spectral Bow - http//www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34528
Denise Spectral Arrows - http//www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34532
Smithing Gear  - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34654
Pay Bounty BAT Files - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35099
author: Six6Star
